name: Cloudflare
goal: Cloudflare is on a mission to help build a better Internet. Cloudflare protects and accelerates any Internet application online without adding hardware, installing software, or changing a line of code. Internet properties powered by Cloudflare have all traffic routed through its intelligent global network, which gets smarter with each new site added. As a result, they see significant improvement in performance and a decrease in spam and other attacks.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: On a European level, Cloudflare follows issues related to the Digital Single Market, with particular interest in policy areas related to data protection/privacy, cyber-security, online content / intermediary liability and internet governance.
